message: Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
You had your chance, now it's my turn
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but let's try to be reasonable.  I'll take a little less if you'll take a little more.
You're running out of time, accept this before it's too late
I'm starting to feel the pressure, but I'm not going to give in to your threats.  Let's try to find a compromise.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.
